statements: SELECT * FROM LightAndTemperatureControl
SELECT room_name, light_status FROM LightAndTemperatureControl WHERE temperature > 20
SELECT id, room_name FROM LightAndTemperatureControl ORDER BY room_name DESC
SELECT * FROM LightAndTemperatureControl WHERE light_status = true
SELECT id, temperature FROM LightAndTemperatureControl ORDER BY temperature ASC
SELECT * FROM LightAndTemperatureControl WHERE temperature > 20 AND light_status = true ORDER BY room_name DESC
SELECT room_name, temperature FROM LightAndTemperatureControl WHERE light_status = false ORDER BY temperature ASC
SELECT id, room_name, light_status FROM LightAndTemperatureControl WHERE temperature < 30 AND light_status = true ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM LightAndTemperatureControl WHERE light_status = true AND temperature <= 25 ORDER BY room_name ASC, temperature DESC
SELECT room_name, temperature FROM LightAndTemperatureControl WHERE light_status = true AND temperature >= 20 ORDER BY temperature ASC
SELECT * FROM lighting_control;
SELECT light_name, brightness FROM lighting_control WHERE brightness > 50;
SELECT light_name, color FROM lighting_control ORDER BY light_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM temperature_control WHERE humidity < 50;
SELECT room_name, temperature FROM temperature_control WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT * FROM lighting_control ORDER BY light_name ASC, brightness DESC;
SELECT light_name, color FROM lighting_control WHERE brightness > 50;
SELECT light_id, light_name, brightness FROM lighting_control WHERE color = 'Warm White';
SELECT * FROM temperature_control WHERE temperature < 22.5 ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT room_name, temperature, humidity FROM temperature_control WHERE humidity > 60;
SELECT * FROM lighting_control WHERE light_status = 'on';
SELECT room_id, light_status FROM lighting_control ORDER BY room_id DESC;
SELECT room_name FROM room_info WHERE room_type = 'bedroom';
SELECT * FROM lighting_control WHERE room_id = 2;
SELECT room_id, temperature FROM temperature_control WHERE temperature > 20;
SELECT * FROM lighting_control WHERE room_id = 1;
SELECT room_name, room_type FROM room_info WHERE room_type = 'living_room';
SELECT id, room_id, temperature FROM temperature_control WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT room_id, light_status FROM lighting_control WHERE light_status = 'on' ORDER BY room_id DESC;
SELECT room_type, room_name FROM room_info ORDER BY room_type ASC, room_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM lighting_control;
SELECT room_id, light_intensity FROM lighting_control WHERE light_status='ON';
SELECT room_id, light_intensity FROM lighting_control ORDER BY light_intensity DESC;
SELECT * FROM temperature_control WHERE temperature_unit='Celsius';
SELECT * FROM room_info WHERE room_location='Office' ORDER BY room_id ASC;
SELECT room_name, room_location FROM room_info;
SELECT task_description, task_time FROM schedule_tasks ORDER BY task_time DESC;
SELECT room_name, room_type, temperature_value FROM room_info JOIN temperature_control ON room_info.room_id = temperature_control.room_id;
SELECT room_name, light_intensity, light_status FROM room_info JOIN lighting_control ON room_info.room_id = lighting_control.room_id WHERE light_intensity > 50;
SELECT room_name, task_description, task_time FROM room_info JOIN schedule_tasks ON room_info.room_id = schedule_tasks.room_id WHERE room_type = 'Office';
SELECT * FROM houses;
SELECT house_name, address FROM houses WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT room_name, floor_number FROM rooms WHERE house_id = 1;
SELECT temperature_value, datetime FROM temperatures ORDER BY datetime DESC;
SELECT light_name, is_on FROM lights WHERE room_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM lights WHERE is_on = TRUE;
SELECT light_name, is_on FROM lights WHERE room_id = 1;
SELECT houses.house_name, rooms.room_name FROM houses INNER JOIN rooms ON houses.house_id = rooms.house_id;
SELECT owner_name, email FROM owners WHERE owner_id IN (SELECT owner_id FROM houses WHERE house_name = 'Example House');
SELECT room_name, AVG(temperature_value) AS avg_temperature FROM temperatures INNER JOIN rooms ON temperatures.room_id = rooms.room_id GROUP BY room_name;
